title: User Evaluation and Moderation
description: Schema for AI-based validation and handling of potentially fake or bot accounts.

isValid.description: Indicates if the user is confirmed to be valid. Should only be true if verification is certain.

suspiciousActivity.description: Set to true if strong indicators of bot/fake behavior are present.

actions.description: AI-determined action to perform based on user evaluation.

status.description: Action to apply to the account.

welcomeMessage.description: Optional welcome message. Only relevant if status is 'welcome'. Can be null or empty.

unapproveReason.description: Optional reason for unapproving the user. Provide only if applicable.
